dataset_description: Short description about, data domain, task and content of the dataset
dataset_description_link: A list of sources which describe the dataset in detail
dataset_download_link: Link to get the dataset from
sensor: if provided, which sensors have been used to collect dataset information
platform: which platform e.g. satellit, aircraft, drone has been used to collect dataset information
spatial_resolution: if raster data, the spatial resolution
temporal_resolution: if temporal data with a stable frequency, which temporal resolution
spatial_extent: bounding box, region description where the data of the dataset has been recorded
temporal_extent: first and last date of allr ecords of the data set
raster: True if it contains raster data
vector: true if it contains vector data
table: true if it contains tabular data
task: the task the dataset describes, e.g. object detectio, image segmentation, regression, classification
number_of_samples: number of records in the dataset
label_by_machine: true if the labels were generated by using a e.g. machien learning algorithem
label_by_human: true if the labels were generated by a human
